created the .iso file from the file used god2iso but the abgx can't create the .dvd file, it says that the .iso file is to small. was there something missing? didnt i do it right did i forget something or is there another step to all this madness  lol...help pls...

Open note pad. Then copy and paste the bottom info not the info in ""


LayerBreak= "Place the layer break number here based on the game you are burning. AP2.5,XGD3 ETC."

AP2.5 is = 1913760
XGD3 is =213352

"This line below the layer break will have the exact name as your game that you are burning. Example (Skyrim.iso)"

Example:
LayerBreak=2133520
Skyrim.iso

Folder:
Skyrim.iso
Skyrim.dvd



Once done save notepad file and change extension to .dvd from .txt. and rename file to the name of your iso.
Now you can double click .dvd and IMGBRN will launch. 
Keep .dvd and iso in same folder.
LayerBreak=2133520
Skyrim.iso
